body: The first one is nice, although it could’ve ended in more happy tone. I wonder if Asuka (the MC’s crush) is dating Ryou (the senior), although she always deny having boyfriend. In the end, Asuka is keeping the fact she saw Reiji and Himawari having sex as secret. Yet, Himawari knows Ryou had been fucking many girls before (including herself), so just maybe, Asuka is more than just the usual casual sex friend. In the end, after getting found out by Asuka, Himawari did tell Reiji she’s serious, and become his girlfriend; but how he acts in the end, such as running away from the club room, and treating her like convenient sex partner, made me think he’s still moving on from his previous crush, even though Himawari is totally more charming in my opinion.
the first story is a better version of miyahara ayumu's story with the black haired girl being rejected by cuck instead better art too and no sameface.
frist com bitch will be always bitch....
